tool.name: matchms remove key
tool.description: Remove metadata entry for all spectra in a library

configfiles.configfile:
@init_logger@
from matchms.importing import load_from_msp from matchms.exporting import save_as_msp
matchms.Metadata.set_key_replacements({})
spectra = list(load_from_msp("${spectral_library}", metadata_harmonization = "False")) new_spectra = [] for spectrum in spectra: if '${key}' in spectrum.metadata._data: del spectrum.metadata._data['${key}'] new_spectra.append(spectrum) save_as_msp(new_spectra, "${output}")

param.label: Spectra file
param.name: spectral_library
param.help: Mass spectral library file to add key.

param.label: Attribute Name
param.name: key
param.help: Name of the attribute which will be removed from all spectra records in the MSP.

tool.help: Description The tool take MSP file as an input and take as parameters the name of the attribute which will be removed from all spectra records in the MSP.
